text.0: urged by the men this vigorous steed lord of the mind omniscient.
text.2: within the filter hath he flowed this soma for the gods effused.
text.4: he shines in beauty there this god immortal in his dwellingplace.
text.6: directed by the sisters ten bellowing on his way this steer.
text.7: runs onward to the wooden vats.
text.8: this pavamana swiftand strong omniscient gave spleudour to.
text.9: the sun and all his forms of light.
text.10: this soma being purified flows mighty and infallible.
